name: TC_06_06 |Verify Autocomplete Suggestions Displayed for Partial and Empty Search Input
description: Verify that user can see autocomplete suggestions that correspond to the entered letters in the Blog search, as well as previous search history when the search field is empty.

Wait for the search result in the popup.
Verify that autocomplete suggestions that match the input are displayed in popup search window
Fill in the Blog search input field.
Wait for the search result in the popup.
